member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.HubException
member.summary: The exception thrown from a hub when an error occurs.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.HubException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.HubException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.HubException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or null if no inner exception is specified.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.HubException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
member.exception: The class name is null or is zero (0).

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Protocol.InvocationBindingFailureMessage
member.summary: Represents a failure to bind arguments for an invocation. This does not represent an actual message that is sent on the wire, it is returned by to indicate that a binding failure occurred when parsing an invocation. The invocation ID is associated so that the error can be sent back to the client, associated with the appropriate invocation ID.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Protocol.InvocationBindingFailureMessage.BindingFailure
member.summary: Gets the exception thrown during binding.

member.summary: Gets the target method name.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Internal.MemoryBufferWriter.CompletedBuffer
member.summary: Holds a byte[] from the pool and a size value. Basically a Memory but guaranteed to be backed by an ArrayPool byte[], so that we know we can return it.
